title: cannot open client
body:
this has been happening for about a month without ever being able to play the game. I've tried redownloading the game and updating my computer but when I open the client first the LoL logo appears as usual then it says PvP.net patch kernel has stopped working.

please help me finally play this game

replies.body: This kernel error is usually caused by a security setting preventing the patcher from opening.  Go over the steps found in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)  guide to configure those settings.  Let me know if you have any questions!
only had to right click and run as admin ;_; thank  you
